Html:
I managed to do this once in the past, but now I can't see how to download a specific version - only the latest version.

If I click on the "Source code" link, it takes me to https://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest. And then from there, whichever release I pick in the "Browsing changes in" drop-list, the Download button only downloads the latest sources.

(I want to download a zip because git pull doesn't work on Ubuntu 13.04/13.10, without rebuilding the latest git from sources.)

It has been moved to Github

TypeScript Course
